SELECT ri.id, ri.user_id AS userId, ri.content, ri.commodity_id, ri.reply_user_id replyUserId, ri.create_date AS createDate, ci.title, ci.name as commodityName, ui.code, ui.name as userName, ui.phone, ui.images FROM reply_info ri LEFT JOIN commodity_info ci on (ci.id = ri.commodity_id) LEFT JOIN owner_info ui ON (ui.id = ri.user_id) WHERE ri.del_flag = 0
AND ci.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{replyInfo.title},'%')
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{replyInfo.userName},'%')
ORDER BY ri.create_date DESC

SELECT ri.id, ri.user_id AS userId, ri.content, ri.commodity_id, ri.reply_user_id replyUserId, ri.create_date, ci.title, ui.name as username, ui.images, ui1.name as replyUserName, ui1.images as replyUserImage FROM reply_info ri LEFT JOIN commodity_info ci ON ( ri.commodity_id = ci.id ) LEFT JOIN owner_info ui ON (ui.id = ri.user_id) LEFT JOIN owner_info ui1 ON (ui1.id = ri.reply_user_id) WHERE 1 = 1 AND ri.commodity_id = #{ commodityId } ORDER BY ri.create_date ASC
